Men's Inseam Length Conversion Chart

Find the perfect length for your pants and trousers with our inseam length conversion chart. This guide helps you understand inseam measurements for different heights, ensuring a proper fit and stylish appearance.

Description Inches Centimeters
Short 28-30 71-76
Regular 32 81
Long 34-36 86-91

How to Measure Your Inseam

  1. Wear a pair of well-fitting pants.
  2. Measure from the crotch seam to the bottom of the ankle.
  3. For the most accurate measurement, have someone else measure for you while you stand straight.
  4. Record the measurement and use the chart above to find your inseam length.

Tip: Consider the type of shoes you'll be wearing with the pants when determining the ideal inseam length.
